Events that occurred on 1 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 â€“ Robert Gilson is one of the first of the 360,000 British casualties of the Battle of the Somme when he is hit by a shell at La Boiselle.
1937 - Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics (first edition) is published.
1952 - Musician David Arkenstone is born.
1972 - Mythcon 3 in Long Beach, California.
1977 - Actress Liv Tyler is born.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Jones Hall in Houston.
2006 - The Gathering of the Fellowship convention in Toronto.
2008 - Tolkien On Fairy-stories is published.
2009 - The Tolkien Calendar 2010 and Tolkien Diary 2010 are published.
2011 - Tolkien Calendar 2012 is published.
2018 - The Tolkien Society Seminar at the Hilton, Leeds.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events on this day.
